title.native: モンスターストライク「消えゆく宇宙編」
title.english: Monster Strike the Animation: The Fading Cosmos

description:
Second part to Monster Strike 2.

Ren and his friends race to save the world from the apocalypse prophesied by the monster Nostradamus. When Mana discovers the truth about her origins and her role in the events to come, she becomes the key that could change everything...for better or for worse.

Unlike its predecessor, The Fading Cosmos is not animated in full CG, returning to the 2D/CG mix used in the first Monster Strike season.
synonyms: Monster Strike the Animation: : The Fading Cosmos
Monster Strike the Anime: The Fading Cosmos

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

title.native: モンスターストライク 2

name.native: デッドラビッツLtd. リント

node.description:
[Website](https://monaca.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MONACA_jp)

__MONACA__ is a Japanese music production studio, which was established by the composer Keiichi Okabe in October 2004.

__Members__:
• [Keiichi Okabe](https://anilist.co/staff/121585/Keiichi-Okabe) (CEO)
• [Satoru Kousaki](https://anilist.co/staff/101555/Satoru-Kousaki)
• [Ryuuichi Takada](https://anilist.co/staff/109459/Ryuuichi-Takada)
• [Kakeru Ishihama](https://anilist.co/staff/150946/Kakeru-Ishihama)
• [Hidekazu Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/141852/Hidekazu-Tanaka)
• [Keiichi Hirokawa](https://anilist.co/staff/156490/Keiichi-Hirokawa)
• [Kuniyuki Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/154774/Kuniyuki-Takahashi)
• [Shuotarou Seo](https://anilist.co/staff/317330/Shoutarou-Seo)
• [Oliver Good](https://anilist.co/staff/317296)
• [Keita Inoue](https://anilist.co/staff/229376/Keita-Inoue)

__Past Members__:
• [Yuri Mitsumi](https://anilist.co/staff/201236/Yuri-Misumi)
• [Keigo Hoashi](https://anilist.co/staff/111233/Keigo-Hoashi)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).
The CEO of Yokohama Animation Lab
